Detailed Description

The section has a list of all internal API which are not exposed to the external applications.

Function Documentation

int32_t MmwDemo_ADCBufConfig ( ADCBuf_Handle  adcBufHandle,
uint16_t  rxChannelEn,
uint8_t  chirpThreshold,
uint32_t  chanDataSize,
MmwDemo_ADCBufCfg *  adcBufCfg,
uint16_t *  rxChanOffset 
)

Description
Function configures ADCBuf driver with data path parameters parsed from configurations

Parameters
[in]adcBufHandleADCBuf driver handle
[in]rxChannelEnrx channel enable bit mask as described in rlChanCfg_t in rl_sensor.h
[in]chirpThresholdChirp threshold
[in]chanDataSizeData size of the ADC channel
[in]adcBufCfgpointer to ADCBuf configuration
[out]rxChanOffsetpointer to rx channel offset in the ADC buffer, for each of enabled rx antenna
Return values
Success- 0 Fail < 0, one of ADCBuf driver error codes
